jpo
Interface ApplicationMenuInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
Jpo
public interface ApplicationMenuInterface

This interface defines the method that an object must implement if it wants to create an ApplicationJMenuBar.

Method Summary
 void requestCheckDirectories()
          Signals that the user wants to reconcile pictures in a directory with those in his collection.
 void requestCheckIntegrity()
          Signals that the user wants to have the Collection Integrity checked.
 void requestCollectionProperties()
          Signals that the user wants to see the Collection Properties dialog.
 void requestEditCameras()
          Signals that the user wants to set up a camera
 void requestEditFind()
          Signals that the user wants to search the collection.
 void requestEditSettings()
          Signals that the user wants to edit the settings of the application.
 void requestExit()
          Signals that the user wants to leave the application.
 void requestFileAdd()
          Signals that the user wants to add pictures to his collection.
 void requestFileAddFromCamera()
          Signals that the user wants to add pictures from the camera to his collection.
 void requestFileLoad()
          Signals that the user wants to load a collection file.
 void requestFileNew()
          Signals that the user wants to create a new empty collection.
 void requestFileSave()
          Signals that the user wants to save a collection file.
 void requestFileSaveAs()
          Signals that the user wants to save a collection file under a new name.
 void requestHelpAbout()
          Signals that the user wants to view the Help|About screen.
 void requestHelpLicense()
          Signals that the user wants to view the Help|License screen.
 void requestOpenRecent(int i)
          Signals that the user wants to load a recently opened file.

requestOpenRecent

public void requestOpenRecent(int i)
Signals that the user wants to load a recently opened file. The parameter i indicates which file to open in the Settings.recentCollections array.

Parameters:
i - the index in the Settings.recentCollections array indicating the file to load.
